relatedBlades.title: The Cloudflare global network
relatedBlades.copy:
Our vast global network, which is one of the fastest on the planet, is trusted by millions of web properties. 

With direct connections to nearly every service provider and cloud provider, the Cloudflare network can reach about 95% of the world's population within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: *AI inference locations

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is rolling out GPUs across our global network
One network — everywhere
relatedBlades.copy: The Cloudflare global network runs every service in every data center so your users have a consistent experience everywhere — whether they are in Chicago or Cape Town. This means all customer traffic is processed at the data center closest to its source, with no backhauling or performance tradeoffs. And with single-pass inspection, security is streamlined and built-in.

Every day, Cloudflare customers use our network to deliver applications to users around the world, secure corporate assets with a Zero Trust model, and streamline WAN architectures. Whether you are storing objects, deploying serverless code, or blocking cyber attacks, all our security and performance capabilities extend globally, making configuration a breeze.
relatedBlades.title: What can the Cloudflare network do for you?

features.title: Developers
features.description: Deploy serverless code everywhere across our network instantly.

features.title: Enterprise architects
features.description: Simplify application delivery architecture and ensure a seamless experience for all users globally.

features.title: IT security
features.description: Protect users in the office and working remotely with consistent Zero Trust security.

features.title: Network administrators
features.description: Improve the performance, reliability, and security of your WAN by using the Cloudflare network.

relatedBlades.title: What is your latency to our network?

buttonOne.elementName: Network Page_What's your latency to the Cloudflare network_CTA

features.title: Blazing fast performance
features.description: With Cloudflare, your corporate network can run faster than the Internet, thanks to a customized Linux server platform, industry-leading innovations, and direct connections to nearly every service provider, cloud provider, and major enterprise.

features.title: Security without tradeoffs
features.description: We do not just secure the network — we secure the whole company. And we use our own security products. We ensure [TLS](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/ssl/transport-layer-security-tls/) encryption for all data in transit and maintain strict physical security standards. We lead the industry in enforcing security hygiene and protecting the fundamental layers of the Internet such as [DNS](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/dns/dns-over-tls/) and [BGP](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/bgp-hijacking/).

features.title: Privacy first
features.description: Cloudflare builds data privacy into everything we do. Since we do not generate revenue from advertising, we default against the collection and retention of personal data we process on your behalf. We have committed to challenging government requests for access to encryption and authentication keys.

relatedBlades.title: Get to any network — faster
relatedBlades.copy: Interconnected with over %{NetworkInterconnects} major service providers, [cloud providers](https://www.cloudflare.com/multi-cloud/), and [enterprise networks](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/network-layer/enterprise-networking/), Cloudflare is your own fast lane on the Internet. By avoiding network hops and optimizing traffic paths, we drastically reduce latency while improving application performance and the end user experience.

relatedBlades.title: Compliance and privacy – built-in
relatedBlades.copy: We give customers control over information passing over our network and make it easy to enforce country-specific rules for access management. Our [Data Localization Suite](https://www.cloudflare.com/data-localization/) provides granular controls on where data is inspected to ease compliance burdens. We engineer our products to meet the highest standards of security and user privacy, including by championing security best practices like [BGP RPKI](https://blog.cloudflare.com/route-leak-detection/) and new standards like [Oblivious DNS over HTTP](https://blog.cloudflare.com/oblivious-dns/).

features.title: Anycast network
features.description: Minimize latency and increase resiliency with a global Anycast network that can effortlessly stop even the largest DDoS attacks.

features.title: Smart routing
features.description: Connect any user to any application up to 30% faster, with a rich application and performance data set that intelligently routes around congestion.

features.title: 100% renewable
features.description: Reduce your carbon footprint by using a network that is 100% powered by renewable energy.

features.title: China network
features.description: Ensure a fast and consistent experience for users inside and outside mainland China with our growing presence in the region.

features.title: Fastest DNS
features.description: Keep your Internet browsing safe and private with [1.1.1.1](https://one.one.one.one/), the world's fastest DNS resolver — powered by the Cloudflare global network.

features.title: Serverless edge compute
features.description: Build and deploy serverless apps instantly across the globe with exceptional reliability, performance, and scale using Cloudflare Workers.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties

features.title: How our network maintains data privacy
features.description: This white paper describes how data travels on the Cloudflare network, data collection and privacy, and our protection of encryption keys.

features.title: Magic Transit protects networks and improves performance
features.description: Review results of app performance tests that demonstrate that latency decreased when traffic was routed over Magic Transit.

features.title: Addressing data locality and privacy obligations in Europe
features.description: Learn about our privacy commitments, our long history of working with European companies, and how our services help organizations meet their data protection needs.

features.title: Improving DNS privacy with oblivious DoH in 1.1.1.1
features.description: The ODoH protocol — co-authored by Cloudflare engineers — is a practical approach for prioritizing user privacy without compromising performance and user experience on the Internet.

relatedBlades.title: See what our network can do for your business
